name: Achievement Hunter: Dogger
description:
Achievement Hunter: Dogger

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the dog who wants to stop the bee who are trying to destroy his house.
You do not have any friends. There are only you, your weapons and a huge number of bee.
Fight for your home, increase your skill, upgrade weapons and prevent invasion of bee into your house.

Game features:
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Cartoon design
  • Real weapons
  • Fearless protagonist
